name: Hims & Hers Health, Inc.
description: Hims & Hers Health, Inc. is a health and wellness company focused on providing accessible healthcare solutions for a range of personal health issues, primarily targeting men and women. Founded in 2017, the company aims to destigmatize health and wellness products by offering a modern telehealth experience and high-quality products through an easy-to-navigate online platform. Hims focuses on various categories including sexual health, hair loss, skincare, and mental health, providing prescription and over-the-counter products directly to consumers. The company's telehealth services allow users to consult with licensed medical professionals and receive personalized treatment plans from the comfort of their homes. Hims & Hers has gained significant recognition for its innovative approach to healthcare, leveraging technology to improve patient access and engagement, while also emphasizing transparency and affordability. The company's mission is to help individuals take control of their health and well-being by removing barriers associated with traditional healthcare services.

key_executives.name: Darwin O. O. W. L. U.

seo.meta_title: Hims & Hers Health, Inc. | Accessible Healthcare Solutions
seo.meta_description: Explore Hims & Hers Health, Inc., a leader in telehealth and wellness solutions. Learn about their innovative products and services designed for personal health.

faq.question: What services does Hims offer?
faq.answer: Hims offers telehealth services and products for sexual health, hair loss, skincare, and mental health.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of Hims?
faq.answer: Andrew Dudum is the CEO of Hims & Hers Health, Inc.

faq.question: Where is Hims headquartered?
faq.answer: Hims is headquartered in San Francisco, California, USA.

faq.question: What types of products does Hims provide?
faq.answer: Hims provides products such as erectile dysfunction treatments, hair loss medication, skincare solutions, and mental health support.
